Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I wouldn't say it made a different, but I think knowing that GenAI was always available in terms of grabbing advice in comparison to my teacher was nice, however, I always questioned whether the feedback was "genuine" or it was actually sufficient in terms of assisting me with my learning.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: In terms of GenAI, I sometimes felt it didn't even help as much, or helped me less, as sometimes GenAI will have a differing opinion compared to my teachers. In saying that as well, GenAI takes a completely objective stance (or tries to) dependent on other people's searches, where as the teacher goes off their experience and what they've seen from other students.
